reviews.review: 100% imprescindible! No te puedes morir sin haberlo jugado xD
Excelente jogo, vale muito a pena pelo preço.

Podría decir tantas cosas que se resumen en GLaDIOS.

El nivel de dificultad de plataformas y puzzles aumenta considerablemente respecto de Portal 1, volviendo a ofrecer una experiencia muy dinámica y divertida con muchas más horas de juego que se nos harán cortas gracias a la amena compañía de GLaDOS. Jamás pensé que me sentiría tan bien siendo humillada y maltratada, le pediré a mi chica que me diga lo adoptada que soy mientras hacemos el amor.

Mi única queja: QUIERO MI TARTA.

Portal (1) ilk çıkan oyunu 2. oyun kadar keyif versede grafik yönüyle biraz puan kaybediyordu fakat bu 2. oyun yerine tam oturmuş resme çığır açmışlar. Testler daha güzel oyun uzunluğu ideal gerçekten 2. oyun bir harika cs go-gmod gibi portal 2 ninde herkesin steam hesabında bulunması gereken bir oyun olacağını düşünüyorum.Fakat hikayeyi anlamak isteyen arkadaşlar direk portal 2 yi almasa daha iyi olur önce portal ı bitirin yada internetten gameplay videolarını izleyin

Oynanabilirlik 10/10
Grafik 10/10
Hikaye 10/10  hatta daha iyi

Gerçekten çok güzel ve eğlenceli bir oyun. Aynı zamanda bazı yerleri çok uğraştırıyor. Daha Multiplayer modunu oynama fırsatım olmadı ancak singleplayer modunu 2 kez bitirdim ve her iki seferinde de eğlendim. Ayrıca oyundaki Çevrimiçi test odaları da insanı zorluyor. Gerçekten zor test odaları var. Ayrıca kendi test odanızı yaratabiliyorsunuz. Bu da hoş bir şey bence. Oyun oynanmaya KESİNLİKLE değer. Alın oynayın pişman olmazsınız

Awesome and killer sequel to Portal. Story is good, cooperative is fun, and the custom maps increases the longevity of the game. While it's definitely a great game, I did wait for it to go on sale, but that's only because I'm cheap. Regardless, totally worth the buy.

Игра основывается на устройстве для создания порталов с помощью которого вы должны решать различные загадки. Поведение "GLaDOS"  (это искусственный интелект который будет пытатся сделать так, чтобы вы проходили эти испытания вечно) непредсказуемо, так что будьте осторожны. Это игра с хорошим сюжетом и замечательным звуковым сопровождением, так что если вас заинтересовала эта игра, то советую её пройти.
Eğer şu ana kadar oynamadıysanız Portal 1 ve 2 yi kesinlikle tavsiye ediyorum

I got it for my girlfriend. 

She played an hour of it and puked.

Portal 2, digne successeur du premier opus sortie en 2007, toujours créé par Valve et sorti en 2011.

HISTOIRE :

Pourquoi commencer par l'histoire ? C'est simple, l'intrigue est omniprésente tout le long. En plus, comme toute suite méritant cette appellation, elle se déroule peu de temps après celle du 1er !
Je n'en dirai pas plus, vous découvrirez par vous même.

GAMEPLAY :

Le gameplay a nettement été amélioré par rapport au premier opus : 
- Les mécaniques ont été peaufinées au peigne fin
- On retrouve les premiers niveaux du 1 ! Sympa
- Utilisation du Portal Gun beaucoup plus poussée.
- UN MODE CO-OP !!!

DURÉE DE VIE :

Énorme par rapport au 1er, rien que pour le mode histoire et sans compter la co-op.

BANDE SON :

Que dire ? Juste génial, rien de plus.

CONCLUSION :

Vous avez aimé le 1 ? Vous aimez les jeux Action-Puzzle-Aventure ? FONCEZ !!!

Portal 2 blew me away the first time I played it.  [spoiler] I wanted to tear up at the end, but the song forced me not to. [/spoiler]  The puzzles are not very hard (you may think about them for a few minutes).  The co-operative testing initiative is also very fun.  Those puzzles [i] will [/i] make you think!  Plus, you get to make your own puzzles using the same testing elements as in the story!  11/10!

this was the first single player story based game I've played and first I though it was really good but it wasn't until I started playing a few other single player games that I realized how amazing this game was, 
most single player games can hook me in for a few hours and I'll just be instantly bored of it, but the experience of portal 2 was just something else, the difficulty of the game is just right, requiring thinking instead of being overly harsh (dark souls) or just hold your hand (far cry). Further more as the main protaganist had no particular character and there aren't many characters involved the feel of the game is mainly solitaire but with glados' occasional acompany it brought just the right amount of amusement to the experience with more and more lore to discover as the game progresses it is simply amazing.

Great replayability and the storyline is great, very creative. 

9.5/10

Gra, w której zwykła kostka z serduszkiem ma więcej charakteru niż (coś tak około) 98,99% bohaterów gier komputerowych. Oprócz tego: GLaDOS dobijająca swoimi inteligentnymi żartami, Wheatley dobijający tekstami, lasery śmiertelnie dobijające, otchłanie zabijające oraz kostki, które o dziwo nie dobijają. A, i ziemniak, którego nie można zjeść. To prawdziwie dobijające. I poziomy, które czasem dobijają. Ogólnie wyśmienity i oryginalny pomysł na zabawę - strzelanie portal gunem portali (to nie dobija, serio). A, zapomniałbym, jeszcze końcowa piosenka, która dobija. I ogólnie koniec dobijający tym, że nie zwiastuje następnej części.
Gra prawdziwie wybitna. 11/10 ;-;
J'ai adoré ce jeu. Original et drôle. J'ai passé un super moment.

After playing the first Portal for the first time, I loved the game play, and humor that Valve had done a fantastic job at. I was already a fan due to their famous games, such as: Half-Life and Half-Life 2 which I also loved. Then I go to play Portal 2, and it had evolved in so many ways. You somewhat feel how better it is to control your character, with not only the keyboard, but the excelent controller support. Graphics have had some great improvement, and the puzzles are SO much more challenging, and without a friend or a playthrough guide you will face some times where you are just so baffled, but its the best kind of brain teasing needed. The new co-op was implimented in with two robots to play as, instead of a human(like the singleplayer and first game had), the co-op is used well to make sure you work together to get the tests done, and some charming customization added in as well. A workshop is in the game as well, that gives us user made levels, all Valve games have this, but this game alone has so much replayability value due to it. The only thing after all that, is the numerous mods, both payed and free that uses Portal 2 as a base, which has given us unique games like Apeture Tag, along with Portal Stories: Mel. All in all, this game deserves a 10/10! Amazingly fun, tons of replayability value, and definitely worth even the base price of $20. But seriously Valve, learn to count to 3 soon so you can continue these amazing game series, or you could just ignore that idea and make a stupid mobile bridge constructor spin off... Why you do this Valve?... Why...

This game is challenging, but not in a "smash your head against the keyboard" kind of way. Sometimes you have to spend a bit of time on figuring out what you're supposed to do, but not so much that the game becomes infuriating.

The story is engaging and humorous, and there's a clear sense of progression. It's not just hopping from one room to the next. The atmosphere changes as the story moves along (while retaining the humor).

After you complete the main story mode, there are a number of options, from playing co-op online, to designing your own test chambers in the steam workshop. You can also compete (indirectly) against friends in challenge mode, to see who can beat a level fastest or with the fewest portals. I've recently discovered commentary mode, where, at various checkpoints in the game, you can activate it for a commentary from one of the game developers. This game really is very enjoyable and well-done.

非常有意思。单机模式和一代连着玩，可以体验一下独特的游戏方式带来的奇妙感受。剧情非常值得体验，有人喜欢深入“探索”，思考主角和GLADOS什么关系，以及她和CAVE Johnson什么关系这些问题上。其实这些问题根本就不是问题。她可能是女儿，也可能是情人；即可能是GLADOS,也可能不是GLADOS，只要游戏制作方公开表示就行。在各种可能性面前，就不要浪费时间了。这个不叫智力游戏，你竟然能拿官方的Chell图片去和Caroline的照片做对比来试图证明两人的血缘关系，如果非要说这能证明你的智商如何，那一定是两个字，傻逼。
至于联机模式，建议找一个靠谱的，能够交流的，同时最好是第一次玩联机的一起来做，这样还是很有乐趣的。

Portal 2 is a great game. It's an amazing puzzle game which has a great story. You go beyond the enrichment center and go deeper into Apperture finding out how it all started and how it went downhill. Once you finish the story try out some custom maps made by the Portal 2 communtity. Some of the creations will leave you breathless ans some might just make you rage. Portal is an awesome game and I fully reccomend it. 10/10
Not many games beat the humor of the Portal games. A bit tricky but a whole lot fun.

Realmente recomiendo este juego, no tienes por qué haber jugado el primero, ya que el juego te dará alguna pista sobre lo que habrás hecho. La historia tiene algún que otro suceso inesperado y las cámaras te enganchan un montón. Además, el juego no acaba cunado completas la historia. Hay un montón de niveles espectaculares al nivel de la historia hechos por los usuarios, ¡y puedes jugar multijugador!

No voy a hacer ningún spoiler, pero destapad esto para ver una pista para saber qué pasará en la historia: [spoiler]Ni los buenos son tan buenos ni los malos son tan malos[/spoiler]

Si mi comentario te ha convencido, ¿a qué esperas para jugar?

Portal 2 - увлекательная игра-головоломка от valve. Сам проходил портал первый около года назад (он вызвал у меня сильнейшие чувства ) ,и вот на скидке за 100 рубликов приобрел вторую часть этого шедевра. И вы знаете ? Я пожалел! Пожалел  что не купил эту замечательную игру раньше даже если бы она стоила сто тыщ мильонов я бы купил её !
Что же такого прекрасного в этой игре ? Давайте разберемся:
*интересный сюжет
*множество отсылок ( к portal и half-life)
*огромное количество стилей локаций
*новые гели( преобразующий, отталкивающий и проталкивающий гели )
*лазер как замена энерго-шарику из первой части
*добавлены лучи плотного света
*экскурсионная воронка
*много интелегентного юмора и сарказма
*а в финале у меня были мурашки по коже )
Минусов нет .
Итог: это даже не игра ,это произведение искусства . Игра к покупке обязательна!
10/10

This game is even better than its prequal. It took everything from the original game and made it fifty times better. The co-op and challenge map remakes are great!
*Horse head teleports onto face* I Love It!

I thought this game was a very very good game to follow portal, I very much enjoyed playing it. That I would have to stop as it was getting late and my mind wasn't able to think properly. 

Things I enjoyed. It was fairly hard at some points. Yes that's a positive, some games are just too easy nowadays. I really liked the new blocks and fluids. added a whole new aspect to the game! I especially liked the level where you have to paint the whole area, it felt like the sims!

Disliked, sometimes it took a while to actually find out where I needed to be in the middle section. which I would be able to complete the game in a quicker time now. So speed run is not recomended on first try! 

I loved the first section the best, the banter was amazing! I half expected to see some skeletons of her parents, but probably for the best was left out! The middle section was my least favourite, although once completed I can very much see the value in it. 

I haven't tried Co op yet, but am looking forward for the opportunity.

Добрый день дорогой читатель , поиграв в етот щедевр я получил массу впечатлений  небуду рассказывать об игре тк на словах это будет выглядить скучным , и вот я бы хотел выставить оценки
сюжет 110 из 10 сюжет тут очень завязан и разнобразен тоесть  всю игру вы не будете проходить головоломки 
кооп 9 из 10 почему 9? да потому что надо иметь  друга со средней логикой и этой игрой чтоб поиграть в кооп (логично , не так ли?)
в игре так же присутствует донат ( как и во всех играх Valve) , донат присутствует только в коопе и то не обязателен , только для того , чтобы разукрасить роботов 
Так же в игре присутствует возможность построить свою камеру для испытаний.
Многи наверное задаются вопросом брать? или не брать? если у тебя имеются лишнии 400 руб то можно взять а если ты нищеброд то можно взять её по скидки выйдит около 90 руб
Вообщем одному вам будет интересно на часов 5 так что уговаривайте друзей купить тоже
